title: Cobalt armor
summaries: Cobalt armor is a Hardmode armor set crafted from Cobalt Bars and is the alternative to Palladium armor. Like many Hardmode ore-based armors, Cobalt armor has three different headpiece options, allowing players to focus on magical, melee, or ranged combat respectively, each changing the bonus applied for wearing a full set. A full set also grants a total of +3% critical hit chance and +10% movement speed / +3% damage, +5% critical hit chance and +10% movement speed, from its individual pieces.
Wearing a full set causes the player to display an after-image effect while in motion, similar to the Ninja armor, Shadow armor, and Necro armor.
Crafting a full set with a single headpiece requires 45 Cobalt Bars (135 Cobalt Ore). Crafting all five pieces requires a total of 65 Cobalt Bars (195 Cobalt Ore).
This armor is not the same as the Ancient Cobalt armor set dropped by Jungle enemies; the latter is effectively reskinned Jungle armor, using the former sprites of this set.

statistics.Defense: [img:Cobalt Hat] : 21 / [img:Cobalt Helmet] : 32 / [img:Cobalt Mask] : 23 (set)
statistics.Set Bonus:
[img:Cobalt Hat] : 14% reduced mana usage
[img:Cobalt Helmet] : 15% increased melee speed
[img:Cobalt Mask] : 20% chance to not consume ammo
statistics.Sell: 360 (set)
